Hoist held out his hand, and shook firmly. "Good to meet you Gesper,
they call me Hoist, and I am in charge of Maintenance." He looked back
at the ship, then to Gesper again. "How observant of you. Our ship is
not a war ship, really it is a classified stealth shuttle."

Pacifix looked to the shuttle. "Crossroads, Klant, Torca, Artemis,
Jet-V, come out and make yourselves known."
